T

TEST - Static variable in class tilt.constants.Service
test java interface
Test - Class in tilt.test
Abstract Test handler
Test() - Constructor for class tilt.test.Test
 
TEXT - Static variable in class tilt.constants.Params
 
TextIndex - Class in tilt.handler
An index into the uploaded HTML, recording the positions of each plain text word, number of words etc.
TextIndex(String, String) - Constructor for class tilt.handler.TextIndex
 
Texts - Class in tilt.test
Some sample texts in html
Texts() - Constructor for class tilt.test.Texts
 
tilt - package tilt
TILT – text-to-image linking tool
TILT - Static variable in class tilt.constants.Service
high-level tilt service name
tilt.align - package tilt.align
This package is an adaptation of Esko Ukkonen's diff algorithm in Information and Control 64, 100-118, 1985.
tilt.constants - package tilt.constants
The constants in this package are for standardising the names of parameters passed into the tilt service (Params), the names of the services used (Service), and the image-types (ImageType).
tilt.exception - package tilt.exception
This package holds exception classes specific to the TILT2 web-service
tilt.handler - package tilt.handler
These classes handle the various types of REST request (PUT,DELETE,GET,POST) and also specific services, such as returning images referred to on HTMLpages (TiltImageHandler) and GeoJson (GeoJsonHandler).
tilt.image - package tilt.image
This package handles everything directly related to the manipulation of images, and preparing them for text-to-image linking.
tilt.image.matchup - package tilt.image.matchup
Matching up fragments of lines in adjacent columns
tilt.image.page - package tilt.image.page
The purpose of this package is to represent the visually identified parts of the page: the lines and word-shapes.
tilt.test - package tilt.test
This package is for testing the TILT Java webservice and is not required for the functioning of TILT.
tilt.test.html - package tilt.test.html
This package is just to define some simple methods for generating HTML economically and cleanly for testing purposes.
TiltDeleteHandler - Class in tilt.handler
Handle a DELETE request
TiltDeleteHandler() - Constructor for class tilt.handler.TiltDeleteHandler
 
TiltException - Exception in tilt.exception
Specific exception classes for various parts of TILT
TiltException(String) - Constructor for exception tilt.exception.TiltException
Create a general TiltException from scratch
TiltException(Exception) - Constructor for exception tilt.exception.TiltException
Wrapper for another exception
TiltGetHandler - Class in tilt.handler
Handle a GET request for various image types, text, GeoJSON
TiltGetHandler() - Constructor for class tilt.handler.TiltGetHandler
 
TiltHandler - Class in tilt.handler
Abstract super-class for all handlers: PUT, POST, DELETE, GET
TiltHandler() - Constructor for class tilt.handler.TiltHandler
 
TiltImageHandler - Class in tilt.handler
Handles requests for various image types, including linked images
TiltImageHandler() - Constructor for class tilt.handler.TiltImageHandler
 
TiltPostHandler - Class in tilt.handler
Handle a POST request
TiltPostHandler() - Constructor for class tilt.handler.TiltPostHandler
 
TiltPutHandler - Class in tilt.handler
Handle a PUT request (used for update)
TiltPutHandler() - Constructor for class tilt.handler.TiltPutHandler
 
toGeoJSON(int, int) - Method in class tilt.image.page.Line
Convert the line to a GeoJSON object for export
toGeoJson(int, int) - Method in class tilt.image.page.Page
Compose the shape information as GeoJson
toString() - Method in class tilt.image.Blob
Convert to string for debug
toString() - Method in class tilt.image.matchup.Matrix
Debug matrix to text
toString() - Method in class tilt.test.html.Attribute
Stringify the attribute, preceding it with a space
toString() - Method in class tilt.test.html.Element
Compose a HTML element for output
toString() - Method in class tilt.test.html.Head
Convert the head to a string
toString() - Method in class tilt.test.html.HTML
Convert the document to a string
traceBack() - Method in class tilt.image.matchup.Matrix
Trace back the path from M,N
